title: GitHub warns users to enable 2FA before upcoming deadline
description: GitHub is warning users that they will soon have limited functionality on the site if they do not enable two-factor authentication (2FA) on their accounts. [...]

title: Integris Health patients get extortion emails after cyberattack
description: Integris Health patients in Oklahoma are receiving blackmail emails stating that their data was stolen in a cyberattack on the healthcare network, and if they did not pay an extortion demand, the data would be sold to other threat actors. [...]
